model.name: Sケープ･メッセンジャー
model.disambiguatingDescription: 自然とアウトドアの美しさを想わせるデザインでアップデートした2024年の｢Sケープ･メッセンジャー｣。美しいフォレストグリーンの柔らかく耐久性にも優れたトリヨンレザーに、アイコニックなモノグラム･パターンをエンボス加工で丁寧に施しました。新たなバリエーションのメゾンの伝統的なSロックスタイルの留め具とジャカード織りの｢Louis Vuitton｣ストラップが、ボディフレンドリーなバッグに個性を添えます。

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• カラー：フォレスト グリーン
  • 素材：モノグラム･パターンをエンボス加工したトリヨンレザー(皮革の種類：牛革)
  • トリミング：レザー(皮革の種類：牛革)
  • ライニング：テキスタイル
  • 金具(色：トーン･オン･トーン)
  • ストラップにジャカード織りのLouis Vuittonシグネチャー
  • 新型ロック付きのメインコンパートメント
  • 外側背面にファスナー式ポケット
  • 内ポケット
  • ストラップにDリング
  • ストラップ：取り外し不可, 調整可能
  • ストラップの頂点からバッグ上部までの長さ(最短)：40.0 cm
  • ストラップの頂点からバッグ上部までの長さ(最長)：63.0 cm
  • ハンドル：シングル

category.name: すべてのメンズ バッグ

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Beware not to scratch or rub your product against abrasive surfaces.
  • For any superficial marks on the lining, we advise wiping with a dry, soft, light-colored cloth. Leather linings are not suitable for dry cleaning treatments.
  • Keep your product away from damp or humid environments and avoid direct exposure to sunlight, keep your product away from any direct source of heat (radiators, car interiors overheated by the sun, etc.).
  • Avoid contact with greasy substances, cosmetics, perfume, and hydroalcoholic solutions, as well as any material (magazines, other leathers, etc.) that may transfer their colored pigments onto the product.
  • Keep your product away from water. Should it get wet or dirty on the surface, dry with a lint free, light-colored, absorbent cloth. Never use soap or solvent.
  • In order to protect your product when you are not using it, store it in the felt protective pouch provided.

Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.

For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To keep your Taurillon Leather product beautiful as the years pass, we recommend following these guidelines for its care :
